long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jBart crawler is a robust crawling studio with which you can extract data from any web site into your systems.

Visual Parsing
Built your parsers with a visual parsing editor. 
Our rich parsing language and live previews make the parsing challenge smooth and effective.

Queues
Navigation and content page extraction is done via queues which simplifies the asynchronous nature of crawling
